page.title: 10Playschool.
page.content: The Playschool is in the old village school.This was built in the 1880's and the local children used it until a new primary school was built in 1968. Mrs.Radburn is in charge of the Playschool and is helped by 3 other local parents Mrs.Sharp,Mrs.Allcock and Mrs.Hargreaves.It is open four mornings a week from 9.15am.to 12o'clock.The cost is 95p.per session. They are allowed 24 children per session.There are 15 children now-6 girls and 9 boys.The children use a sand pit,trampoline,play barrel,slide, water tray, games,paints and paper. About Â£300 each year is raised towards the cost of running the Playschool. The Playschool helps children to make the change from home to full time school.
